Wairoa Cyclone Gabrielle flooding: Future floods more predictable after risk first identified 30 years ago https://www.nzherald.co.nz/hawkes-bay-today/news/wairoa-cyclone-gabrielle-flooding-future-floods-more-predictable-after-risk-first-identified-30-years-ago/ X5VEL66AHVE2JAKXUQFF47LVG4/ https://www.nzherald.co.nz/hawkes-bay-today/news/wairoa-cyclone-gabrielle-flooding-future-floods-more-predictable-after-risk-first-identified-30-years-ago/ X5VEL66AHVE2JAKXUQFF47LVG4/ James PocockForwarning of flooding should be predictable now, but time for action will remain short. Tue, 16 Apr 2024 04:01:59 +0000 An independent investigation into Wairoa’s flooding after Cyclone Gabrielle commissioned by Wairoa District Council has found that flooding risks in the area were highlighted as early as 1994. Photo / NZME

Shelford Hawira named as Auckland man who died in Whangārei Heads water incident https://www.nzherald.co.nz/northern-advocate/news/shelford-hawira-named-as-auckland-man-who-died-in-whangarei-heads-water-incident/A54TJW7AUZBM5C2D5PIYR6QGRQ/ https://www.nzherald.co.nz/northern-advocate/news/shelford-hawira-named-as-auckland-man-who-died-in-whangarei-heads-water-incident/A54TJW7AUZBM5C2D5PIYR6QGRQ/ Denise PiperShelford Hawira died after suffering a heart attack and falling into the water on Sunday. Tue, 16 Apr 2024 03:47:18 +0000 Shelford Hawira, 54, died in the incident at Urquharts Bay on Sunday morning. His family say he was shy and did not like his face photographed but he liked this photo of him on his bike.
